channel.title: short film on Tapes @ Provo.lol
channel.description: Recent content in short film on Tapes @ Provo.lol

item.title: Fri 10 Feb 2023: Short films from the Nordics
item.description: DETAILS: Short Films from the Nordics 10 February 2023 8.30 PM UK time / 9.30 PM CET/WAT Duration: ca. 120 mins Watch party: Provo.lol on Twitch #1 Oslos Rose, Det Sporadiske Filmkollektivet, Norway (2015), 7 min Ind i Varmen (Sauna rules), Morten Schmidt and Thomas Diepeveen, Denmark (2020), 7 minutes Heartless, Haukur Björgvinsson, Iceland (2021), 15 minutes Erään hyönteisen Tuho (The Death of an Insect), Hannes Vartiainen and Pekka Veikkolainen, Finland (2010), 7 minutes #4 Møtes i døra (When one door closes), Det Sporadiske Filmkollektivet, Norway (2017), 15 minutes Nordlys (Northern Lights), Kristoffer Kiørboe, Norway (2009), 27 minutes Rehousing Technosphere, Wang & Söderström, Denmark (2023), 6 minutes Hanasaari A, Hannes Vartiainen and Pekka Veikkolainen, Finland (2009), 16 minutes Arbete åt alla!
